text: Samkor Kiatmontep (, born April 4, 1975) is a Muay Thai fighter from Thailand. He is known for his devastating left kicks. Samkor made a total of 300 fights for 248 wins, 50 losses and 2 draws. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 1995 Lumpinee Stadium 122 lbs Champion * 1997 Lumpinee Stadium 135 lbs Champion * 2000 Lumpinee Stadium 130 lbs Champion * 1997 Thailand (P.B.A.T) 135 lbs Champion * 2004 All Japan Kickboxing Federation All Japan Lightweight Tournament Runner-Up * 2005 Toyota Marathon 154 lbs Tournament Winner * 2011 World Muay Thai Council 154 lbs Champion ==Fight Record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:95%;
